docs.lead_paragraph: "There is no use in locking up rooms when you are going to have carpenters and plumbers around," says a man who thinks he knows. "You might as well save yourself the trouble, for wherever they want to go they will, and the lock will not stop them. I discovered that when I had a house that was undergoing repairs in my charge at one time.

headline.main: Women Here and There -- Their Frills and Fancies
